name: Hull Breach (itch) (Braneloc)
description:
Hull Breach

Your spaceship has been struck by micro meteorites and created a lot of holes.  Your mission, should you choose to accept it (the consequences of not accepting it includes death and gasping for air in a vacuum) is to fix the breaches before your air supply runs out !

Unfortunately the WebGL version was non-viable, so uploaded as an exe.

This game was designed, modelled, textured, sounded, programmed and thrown together in less than a week for the Brackey's Game Jam 2020.1 - there are a lot of things I would have added if it was slightly more time..  I ran out of time for full polishing and tuning, so it may be mildly buggy but mostly playable.
